title: gzweb compitabilty problems with gazebo 6 and 7

content.raw:
I've followed the install instructions for gzweb on a clean Ubuntu 14 and 15 System. Both do not work out of the box due to an error with roslib (connection error, pops up in google chrome dev tools console).

Uninstalling gazebo 7 (which is installed when following the instructions) or gazebo 6 and its dependencies and installing gazebo 5 fixes the error.

To be precise, I'm running gazebo 6.6.0 running on trusty on my machine right now and checked out the branch gzweb_1.2.0 of this repo. ROS version is indigo.

Since I haven't seen any note addressing that dependency-issue, I thought it could be a general bug.

Cheers,
Max

I've followed the install instructions for gzweb on a clean Ubuntu 14 and 15 System. Both do not work out of the box due to an error with roslib (connection error, pops up in google chrome dev tools console).

Uninstalling gazebo 7 (which is installed when following the instructions) or gazebo 6 and its dependencies and installing gazebo 5 fixes the error.

To be precise, I'm running gazebo 6.6.0 running on trusty on my machine right now and checked out the branch gzweb_1.2.0 of this repo. ROS version is indigo.

Since I haven't seen any note addressing that dependency-issue, I thought it could be a general bug.

Cheers, Max
